WorkItem.Description: If I put 2 weapon expertise talent points on my rogue, I get millions of DPS.
WorkItem.Summary: [Rogue] 2 Weapon Expertise Gives Millions of DPS

Comments.Message: If it doesn't show up immediately (may not just be weapon expertise), optimizing talents seems to show it up for me immediately.
Please, really, follow the bug reporting guidelines. We can't help you or solve the issue if you don't.

Apologies... I was tired and working on other things.

Repro steps:
1. Launch Rawr
2. Load the attached character
3. See DPS points are 5926889

Additional information:
Rawr 2.3.18

Clearing the combat talent tree down to only having 1 weapon expertise puts DPS values back into a reasonable range.
I'm going to look into this.
I don't know why you're complaining... I'd personally be pretty happy if I got 6 million DPS out of my Warrior.  Stupid ******* "hybrid" tax, giving Rogues 6 mil DPS and not us, *grumblegrumble*

Fixed in the next version.
The problem was that with the right spec you could get negative cost Envenom cycles, thus giving a stupendous amount of CPGs.
